caveats: Although the frequency of updates is set to every month, updates may occur more or less frequently
dataset_source: FPMA, RRD, Vulnerability Analysis and Mapping (VAM) - WFP via FAO: GIEWS, WFP
license_title: Creative Commons Attribution for Intergovernmental Organisations
name: wfp-food-prices-for-afghanistan
notes: This dataset contains Food Prices data for Afghanistan, sourced from the World Food Programme Price Database. The World Food Programme Price Database covers foods such as maize, rice, beans, fish, and sugar for 98 countries and some 3000 markets. It is updated weekly but contains to a large extent monthly data. The data goes back as far as 1992 for a few countries, although many countries started reporting from 2003 or thereafter.

organization.name: wfp
organization.title: WFP - World Food Programme
organization.description:
The World Food Programme (WFP) is the leading humanitarian organization saving lives and changing lives, **delivering food assistance in emergencies** and **working with communities to improve nutrition and build resilience**. 

As the international community has committed to [end hunger, achieve food security and improve nutrition by 2030](https://www.wfp.org/ending-hunger), **one in ten people worldwide still do not have enough to eat**. Food and food-related assistance lie at the heart of the struggle to break the cycle of hunger and poverty. 

For its efforts to **combat hunger**, for its contribution to bettering conditions for peace in conflict-affected areas and for acting as a driving force in **efforts to prevent the use of hunger as a weapon of war** and conflict, WFP was awarded the **Nobel Peace Prize in 2020**. 

In 2022, WFP assisted **160 million people**, a historic high.

On any given day, WFP has 6,500 trucks, 20 ships and 140 aircraft on the move, [delivering food and other assistance](https://www.wfp.org/supply-chain) to those in most need. These numbers lie at the roots of WFP’s unparalleled reputation as an [emergency responder](https://www.wfp.org/emergency-preparedness-and-response), one that gets the job done quickly at scale in the most difficult environments.

WFP’s efforts focus on [emergency assistance](https://www.wfp.org/emergency-relief), **relief and rehabilitation, development aid** and **special operations. Two-thirds** of our work is **in conflict-affected countries** where people are three times more likely to be undernourished than those living in countries without conflict.

title: Afghanistan - Food Prices
